short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No backstory, ads, etc.  Just show me the recipe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension cuts down on all the noise that exists on recipe websites.  It will find the recipe on the page, and just show that.  Say goodbye to backstories, advertisements, and all the other junk that's found on recipe websites.
